abstract: The action affected turbodiesel models from the 2009-12 model years, as well as the Audi A3 TDI from 2010-12.
snippet: The action affected turbodiesel models from the 2009-12 model years, as well as the Audi A3 TDI from 2010-12.
lead_paragraph: Volkswagen Group of America is recalling about 168,000 Volkswagens and Audis equipped with the TDI engine because of a fire hazard, according to a report filed by the automaker with the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration.

headline.main: Volkswagen Recalls 168,000 TDI Models for Fire Hazard
